enchantment.soulbound.soulbound.desc: The item is automatically retained upon death and randomly damaged
text.autoconfig.soulbound.title: SoulBound
text.autoconfig.soulbound.option.isTreas: Treasure enchantment (i.e. the enchantment table cannot be swiped)
text.autoconfig.soulbound.option.blackli:
Example:(Only vanilla items support omitting prefixes)
minecraft:diamond_sword{Damage:0}
minecraft:diamond_sword
diamond_sword
minecraft:diamond_sword*
diamond_sword*
